column3: A special set of clothes worn for a costume party, to represent a character, or for a performance.
A formal dress, usually long and full-length, which is worn for a special occasion.
A garment which covers the lower half of the body, typically with material that hangs down.
A casual garment which covers the lower half of the body, typically with short material.
A type of pants which are form-fitting, typically made of a stretchable material.
